controller

Class FarmerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FarmerController

  • public class FarmerController
extends java.lang.Object
    The FarmerController class coordinates the functions available in the Data Managers for the Menu class. It manages PlotDataManager and RankDataManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FarmerController()
      Constructs a FarmerController object and Initialises Data Managers

      This method retrieves the list of the graphical display of plots of the user.
